EmailTemplate.name: ES-2016-04-06-Pure Storage Webinar.EMAIL-Pure Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Pure Storage & VMTurbo Webinar - Beyond The Array: Full Stack QoS
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.purestorage.com/resources/type-b/beyond-the-array-full-stack-qos-on-pure-storage-with-vmturbo.html?utm_source=vmturbo]]> Register Now! <[[http://www.purestorage.com/resources/type-b/beyond-the-array-full-stack-qos-on-pure-storage-with-vmturbo.html?utm_source=vmturbo]]>
Date: Thursday, April 14th Time: 9 AM PT / 12 PM ET
Pure Storage FlashArrays have revolutionized the performance and cost economies of the enterprise storage tier. As the ever-increasingly complex waves of virtualization and private cloud abstract the upper layers of the stack, resource alignment in compute and network- in addition to storage- are imperative to guaranteeing consistent Quality of Service to business and users.
View this webinar to hear experts from Pure Storage and VMTurbo discuss the benefits that numerous customers have reaped from combining the two technologies to guarantee full-stack QoS adherence.
REGISTER NOW <[[http://www.purestorage.com/resources/type-b/beyond-the-array-full-stack-qos-on-pure-storage-with-vmturbo.html?utm_source=vmturbo]]> <[[http://twitter.com/#!/purestorage]]> <[[http://www.linkedin.com/company/pure-storage]]> <[[http://www.facebook.com/PureStorage]]> <[[http://www.youtube.com/user/purestorage]]> <[[https://plus.google.com/104856539646760720998/]]> <[[http://www.purestorage.com/blog/feed/rss/]]> Contact Us <[[http://info.purestorage.com/ContactSales.html]]> | Privacy Policy <[[http://www.purestorage.com/privacy/]]> | Unsubscribe <[[http://info.purestorage.com/UnsubscribePage.html?mkt_unsubscribe=1&mkt_tok=]]> Pure Storage: 650 Castro Street, Suite #260 Mountain View, CA 94041
